# 88. Install uv for Python dependency management

**Date:** 2025-05-08

**Optional per env:** _required on all environments_


## CommCare Version Dependency
This change is not known to be dependent on any particular version of CommCare.


## Change Context
CommCare HQ is moving to using `uv` for Python dependency management, which
simplifies and speeds up dependency installation.

## Details
It is necessary to install `uv` on all servers that run CommCare HQ code.

## Steps to update
To install `uv`, run:

```sh
cchq <env> deploy-stack
```
